name: MRSAColonizationOrInfection
title: MRSA Colonization or Infection
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This grouping of value sets identifies patients who have a Methicillin resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) infection, .a history of MRSA, colonization with MRSA or a positive screen for MRSA (which would result in a diagnosis of MRSA)),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have a MRSA infection,a history of MRSA, colonization with MRSA or a positive screen for MRSA (which the provider will use to determine if they have MRSA.  Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the Diagnosis category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Only use codes which represent MRSA infection, colonization with MRSA, a history of MRSA or a positive screen for MRSA..  Codes used are to be ICD9CMm ICD10CM, and SNOMED-CT only.),(Exclusion Criteria: None)

contains.display: Methicillin resistant Staphylococcus aureus in conditions classified elsewhere and of unspecified site
Methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus infection of postoperative wound (disorder)
Sepsis caused by methicillin resistant Staphylococcus aureus (disorder)
Sepsis due to Methicillin resistant Staphylococcus aureus
Methicillin resistant Staphylococcus aureus infection, unspecified site
Methicillin resistant Staphylococcus aureus infection as the cause of diseases classified elsewhere
Carrier or suspected carrier of Methicillin resistant Staphylococcus aureus
Personal history of Methicillin resistant Staphylococcus aureus infection
